sentences.en: And for the leaders in Bejing to shrink and wince and draw back in the presence of these individuals and their ideas sends a clear message.
sentences.cn: 北京的领导人对他们的催促显的畏畏缩缩，并不让这些人抛头露面，政府的以对理念给外界发出了一个清晰的信号。

sentences.en: As soon as he touched her she seemed to wince and stiffen.
sentences.cn: 只消他碰到她,她便一阵畏缩,全身僵硬.

sentences.en: CEDraw is high speed graphics library in WinCE.
sentences.cn: CEDraw是高速的嵌入式图形库.

sentences.en: COM 954 driver under wince complete source code can be used directly.
sentences.cn: COM954驱动下畏缩完整的源代码可以直接使用.

sentences.en: His smile soon modified to a wince.
sentences.cn: 他的微笑很快就成了脸部肌肉的抽搐.

sentences.en: I still wince at the memory of the stupid things I did.
sentences.cn: 我一想起自己做过的蠢事就不由得摇头叹气.

sentences.en: It is based on open operation system such as WinCE, Symbian, Palm or Embedded Linux.
sentences.cn: 它以开放的OS为 基础,比如人们熟悉的微软WinCE 、 Symbian 、 Palm、EmbeddedLinux等 操作系统,向手机用户提供丰富多彩的应用程序.

sentences.en: Last year's indulgence, a new 25 - inch television, still makes him wince.
sentences.cn: 去年的挥霍, 一台25英寸的电视机依然让他很畏缩.

sentences.en: Native English speakers may wince but are an ever - shrinking minority.
sentences.cn: 英语母语人士也许会厌烦这种情况,但这些人是少数,而且数量在不断减少.

sentences.en: Sandra winced as the dentist started to drill.
sentences.cn: 牙医开始钻牙了，桑德拉敛眉蹙额。

sentences.en: She didn't wince and her eyes were dry. Talk about brave. She was unbelievable.
sentences.cn: 她连眉头也未皱一下，也没哭。说到勇敢，她令人难以置信。

sentences.en: Source code for CS 8900 Network WinCE complete source code, has been tested.
sentences.cn: 源代码CS8900网络,嵌入式完整的源代码, 已经过测试.

sentences.en: The barb of his wit made us wince.
sentences.cn: 他那锋芒毕露的机智使我们退避三舍.

sentences.en: The burn of the antiseptic made him wince.
sentences.cn: 消毒剂的刺痛使他连忙缩手.

sentences.en: The insertion of the needle under the skin made him wince.
sentences.cn: 针刺入皮下使他畏缩起来。

sentences.en: The thought made her wince.
sentences.cn: 这念头使她恐缩.

sentences.en: To start or wince involuntarily, as from surprise or pain.
sentences.cn: 退缩由于惊奇或疼痛而惊起或退缩.

sentences.en: Uncouthly, he told stories that made everybody at the table wince.
sentences.cn: 他把故事讲得很粗俗, 在座的人都赶紧避开了.

sentences.en: We all wince at the thought of how Xerox utterly failed to innovate on PARC's inventions, allowing Apple and Microsoft to run away with most of them.
sentences.cn: 我们都退避在想到施乐如何完全的失败再帕洛阿尔托研究中心的发明，允许苹果和微软从他们这儿逃走。

sentences.en: Who smile and frown, wince and hiss.
sentences.cn: 他们微笑和皱眉，畏缩与嘶嘘。

trans.tran_cn: （因痛苦或不安）皱起脸，龇牙咧嘴
trans.tran_en: to suddenly feel very uncomfortable or embarrassed because of something that happens, something you remember etc
